text: Is there a chat specifically for discussing local development issues? I'm having a few problems with pulling and pushing changes to HubSpot. When I make a change to a module in the visual editor and then pull it back to my local copy, it skips the file. Which means if I push changes later, it overwrites my module  on HubSpot with a blank one.
Hey James! <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> is the place for discussion on local development
I am guessing you are missing the *`--overwrite`* option on your fetch request? <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development-reference#fetch>
Ah, I totally missed that part! Yeah, that should sort it!
Any ideas why this might happen when fetching the files?
Hm, and are files not being fetched? All or some?
